name: Hollywood Princess Makeover
description:
Create exciting hot new looks and show off your sense of style and fashion with this awesome game.

They need to be dressed trigged for her wedding! Start with a soothing spa treatment to make sure her hair and skin is clean and clear. Next, help her do her make up. Lastly pick out the perfect princess dress with jewelry to match! Make this a dream princess show!


** Features **
- Treat yourself to the ultimate spa experience with soothing facial masks, cool cucumbers for your eyes, and even a steaming treatment!
- Experiment with dozens of different makeup, lipsticks, eyes, eye-shadow, hair color and much more.
- how to apply eye maskara makeup , blush , beautiful lipglosh , eyeshadow , bronzer
- makeup artist school for girls, teach you makeup styles and makeup lines
- waterproof eye maskara makeup ideas
- best powder foundation cosmetics makeupp
- best makeup remover and natural makeup tutorials
- long lasting lipstick & become makeup artist
- contact lenses with wide range of colors
- Lots of Dresses for the best day.
- Huge variety of princess wedding items, including earrings, necklaces and purses.
- Makeup and Dress up her in the gown of your dreams.
- best hairstyles and hair color with no barber shop
- play with hair like hair transplant and hair restoration
- hot tub for bath
-dress like white sundresses with maxi designer dress
- save & share your perfect girls easily over Facebook or twitter with one click.


Download and enjoy free games , don't forget to write your precious review this would help us a lot!
developers: Phoenix : makeup & dress-up educational free salon games for princess girls & kids
